result.title: Technologies for MOVING data processing and visualisation v2.0
result.description: The initial versions of the data processing and visualisation components are integrated and running in the operational MOVING platform. Thus, the components are particularly tested towards scalability and reliability. The components are extended by additional functionalities (e.g. more concepts are offered in the fragment annotation, author linkage between publications and videos etc).
